ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Player wipe on Test
ygData.msgSnippet: ... why is it a big deal that there was no notice?  you didn t get a grieving period? ... i wouldn t blame verant for this.  blame your greedy fellow players.
ygData.messageBody:
At 10:30 AM 6/21/00 -0400, you wrote:
>I agree Steve. I am angry that they wiped so fast and with so little
>notice. I am not angry that they wiped. Just that we got little to no
>warning. I found out this morning when I tried to log in to play on test
>for a change. It's never been my primary server (ok it was while I was
>powerlevelling myself to 50 there) so it's no big deal. But it was my only
>50 char :( My character on Saryrn is only 44 as of now. It was nice to be
>able to say I had a 50. Guess I just gotta work that much harder to get
>another ;)

why is it a big deal that there was no notice? you didn't get a grieving period?

>Am I going back? Hell no. I lost all my gear more times than I care to
>remember to corpses getting stuck in walls, in geography in gates, whatever.
>Then to get wiped with no notice because Verant f'd up? Nah, thanks I'll
>stick to a live server. At least they back those up regularly.

i wouldn't blame verant for this. blame your greedy fellow players.


>Lyrnia
